Data Fields
rlAdvChirpDynLUTAddrOffCfg_t Struct Reference

Advanced Chirp Dynamic LUT Address Offset Configuration Structure Configure LUT address offset dynamically for each chirp parameters. More...

#include <control/mmwavelink/include/rl_sensor.h>

Data Fields

rlUInt16_t addrMaskEn
 Enable mask for LUT address offset dynamic update, the address is updated for following enabled chirp parameters.
Bit Definition
b0 Enable CHIRP_PROFILE_SELECT
b1 Enable CHIRP_FREQ_START_VAR
b2 Enable CHIRP_FREQ_SLOPE_VAR
b3 Enable CHIRP_IDLE_TIME_VAR
b4 Enable CHIRP_ADC_START_TIME_VAR
b5 Enable CHIRP_TX_EN
b6 Enable CHIRP_BPM_VAL
b7 Enable TX0_PHASE_SHIFTER
b8 Enable TX1_PHASE_SHIFTER
b9 Enable TX2_PHASE_SHIFTER
b15:10 Reserved
.
 
rlUInt16_t reserved0
 Reserved for Future use.
 
rlUInt16_t lutAddressOffset [10U]
 This field provides the start address offset within the Generic SW Chirp Parameter LUT which holds dither parameters (LUT Dither) for each chirp parameter, each address offset is 2 bytes.
The address will be updated only if ADDRESS_MASK_EN is SET.
Bytes Definition
Bytes 1:0 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for CHIRP_PROFILE_SELECT
Bytes 3:2 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for CHIRP_FREQ_START_VAR
Bytes 5:4 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for CHIRP_FREQ_SLOPE_VAR
Bytes 7:6 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for CHIRP_IDLE_TIME_VAR
Bytes 9:8 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for CHIRP_ADC_START_TIME_VAR
Bytes 11:10 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for CHIRP_TX_EN
Bytes 13:12 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for CHIRP_BPM_VAL
Bytes 15:14 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for TX0_PHASE_SHIFTER
Bytes 17:16 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for TX1_PHASE_SHIFTER
Bytes 19:18 LUT_ADDRESS_OFFSET for TX2_PHASE_SHIFTER
Address offset has to be multiple 4 bytes (word boundary)
.
 
rlUInt32_t reserved1
 Reserved for Future use.
 
rlUInt32_t reserved2
 Reserved for Future use.
 
rlUInt32_t reserved3
 Reserved for Future use.
 

Detailed Description

Advanced Chirp Dynamic LUT Address Offset Configuration Structure Configure LUT address offset dynamically for each chirp parameters.
